籤詩版本二:
Apo mhepo inotungidza makenduru nemimvuri mishoma mudenga, inova semaruva ari muchionioni ari mundangariro.
Ndaneta ndokumbirwa nevana kuti ndichengetewo ndoziva sei kuti inhema chete?
詩意:
Hexagram iyi yakafanana nemhepo inobatidza kenduru.
Mukurumbira wenhema unokuvadza zvinhu zvose.
解曰: Pfuma iri kudenga. Urombo magumo. Hapana chikonzero chekutsvaka mazano. Zvose zvakatemerwa.
籤詩故事一:
◇Rwendo rwechitanhatu rweKong Ming kubva muQishan
Munguva yeHumambo Hutatu, Gomo reQishan rakamhanya richiyambuka Wei neShu. Kong Ming akadzokorora kuenda kuQishan Mountain kunorwisa Wei asi akakundikana.
Kechitanhatu paakabuda kuenda kuQishan, Kong Ming akanyora mirairo yake, asi akatadza kuhwina pakupedzisira. Pakupedzisira, Zhuge Liang akafa nehurwere muWuzhangyuan aine makore makumi mashanu nemana nekuda kwekushanda zvakanyanya.
(Nyaya iyi dimikira rekuti “njere hadzina kuenzana nekarma”)
聖意: Namatira imba yako, chenjerera, tsvaga pfuma uye pfuma, chenjera mubhizinesi, chenjera muwanano yako, chenjera muwanano, chengeteka muLiujia, ita chishamiso, mupfuuri, kurasikirwa nemakonye esirika, kurasikirwa nemombe, kurasikirwa ne munhu, munhu akashaika, mhosva yeruzhinji, kurasikirwa kwekutama, kuchengetedza, kurasikirwa nepfuma, chirwere chakaipa, mhosva yeYinshan guva rekugadzirisa.
